description:
Presentation : 

Warning, this game is planned for children, ryhtme is slow. It is easy and therefore not very interesting for adults. 

Dolphins for kids is a game designed specially for young children. When a level is successful, your child wins a photo of a dolphin. It can free up to 20 pictures through the 20 levels of play 

The difficulty is measured for the youngest! 

Game Type : casual game - skill game 

Your child will collect pictures of dolphin at each succesfull level. Dolphins for Kids is a game of skill where the child should touch the cards in return before they disappear. 

Using the click screen in 20 levels suitable for children. 

Features: 

- Entertaining game on the theme of Dolphins 
- Three difficulty levels 
- Intuitive control interface and clear 
- Automatic backup of progression. 
- Growth awarded 20 pictures of Dolphins available in your collection 
- 20 levels to accomplish 
- A simple game for younger where he can play without your help
